title: How to use Deep Fusion with iPhone SE 3, iPhone 13, and more
content:
Apple’s Deep Fusion tech that the company describes as “computational photography mad science” first arrived with iPhone 11. Now it’s even supported on the iPhone SE 3 alongside iPhone 12 and 13. Here’s how to turn on Deep Fusion on iPhone including how it works and when the feature kicks in.

more…

The post How to use Deep Fusion with iPhone SE 3, iPhone 13, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This step-by-step guide covers how to use Deep Fusion on iPhone cameras as well as how and when Deep Fusion works.
